snippet.title: Brink of Consciousness: Dorian Gray Syndrome - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Have you ever had someone track your every step? Known that a wrong move could kill one you love? Help journalist Sam Wilde, rescue Anna, his love, from a serial maniac who sees you, and everyone, as a tool of his art.

Get the game for free here:
iPad: http://bit.ly/1aD3zTx
iPhone: http://bit.ly/12GfSJQ
Amazon Kindle: http://amzn.to/13sur5T
Google Play: http://bit.ly/12H7fKF
PC: http://bit.ly/yhnL0U
Mac: http://bit.ly/18weTAe
